citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:15am-11:45am on
4/19/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by knocking at the door for the address provided for the site
of this account, and by calling to the phone number provided in the registration application. Failure to provide access to
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may
result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:15am-11:45am on 
4/19/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by knocking at the door for the address provided for the site 
of this account, and by calling to the phone number provided in the registration application. Failure to provide access to 
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may 
result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
